name: PARC
body:
### About
PARC is dedicated to providing affordable rehearsal space for performing arts groups, including theater, dance, and music. We are currently looking to open a space in Cambridge, MA. We are hoping to open by October.

### Rates & Booking
Our goal is to offer space rental rates as low as $15 an hour along with easy, automatic availability checking and booking.

### Want to help?
We're still looking for spaces, and there will be a lot of work to be done when we find one.  Fill out [this form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1yzYG-nxvNXGJ3EjXejmhgU_cUZCCDy5lw7VFjOoR8y0/viewform) if you want to be kept in the loop or offer your ideas!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
